detectors.description:
Pausable.whenNotPaused() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#575-578) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool,string)(! _paused,Pausable: paused) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#576)

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#331-338) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#335)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#336)
detectors.markdown:

	Dangerous write operations:
	- [_balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#L335)
	- [_balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/JuggernautXPToken.sol#L336)
